name: GetApplicationHistory
description:
Fetch a paginated list of application history items.

Use this tool to obtain detailed history records of an application, including updates and changes over time. Useful for tracking application progress or changes in candidate information.

parameters.name: application_history_filter
parameters.description: JSON string specifying filters and criteria for fetching the application history list. Include pagination details and filters like date range or status.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
